string.name: pref_cat_general
string.comment: name of the general preference category

string.name: pref_cat_sync
string.comment: title of the sync preferences category

resources.string: Iscrie sa risposta in sa carta
Reseta sos assignamentos de sas limbas (pro su sintetizadore vocale e sos ditzionàrios) pro totu sos matzos
Resetare totu sos assignamentos de limbas?
Mannària de su butone de risposta
Dimensionamentu de sos caràteres de su navigadore de cartas
Ammustra sos nùmenes de sos documentos in su navigadore de cartas
Ammustra sos nùmenes de sos documentos multimediales in sos campos pregunta/risposta de su navigadore de cartas
Cua sas barras de sistema e sos butones de risposta
Positzione de su butone de sas rispostas
Assigna gestos a atziones che a sas rispostas e a sas modìficas de sas cartas.
Permiti sos gestos tàtiles in sos àngulos de s\'ischermu
Pannellu de navigatzione a ischermu intreu
Aberi su pannellu de navigatzione cando trìsinas cara a dereta dae cale si siat puntu de s\'ischermu

string.name: gestures_none
string.comment: No gestures

resources.string: Abilitat su menù de cuntestu ‘%s’ globalmente
Addopiat sa distàntzia de iscurrimentu cun eReader
Leghet sa pregunta e sa risposta si non b\'est unu documentu sonoru inclùdidu
Recùpera sos mèdios cun sa sincronizatzione
Sincroniza in manera automàtica a s\'allughidura/serrada de s\'aplicatzione si s\'ùrtima sincronizatzione est prus betza de 10 minutos.

string.name: sync_media_always
string.comment: Option to always fetch media when syncing

resources.string: Petzi in sas connessiones chene lìmites
Muda s\'icona de sincronizatzione cando sas modìficas si podent carrigare
Permite sa sincronizatzione cun connessiones a consumu
Si est disabilitadu at a retzire un\'avisu si as a proare a sincronizare cun una connessione a consumu
Mustra sas rispostas in automàticu chene interventos de s\'utente. Cunfigura dae sas optziones de su matzu.
Disabìlita su renderizadore fìsicu (hardware) de sas cartas
Su renderizadore fìsicu (hardware) est prus lestru ma diat pòdere tènnere problemas, mescamente in Android 8/8.1. Si non resesses a bìdere cantos de s\'interfache de impreu proa custa impostatzione.
Disabìlita totu sas animatziones e imprea una manera prus segura de disinnare sas cartas. Diat podere èssere netzessàriu pro sos dispositivos a tinta digitale.
Disabìlita sa modalidade de modìfica a campu sìngulu
Permitet su menù de cuntestu \'Omissione (iscantzellamentu cloze)\' in sa modalidade orizontale
Tzentra in verticale su cuntenutu de sas cartas
Su de duos tocos in sos butones de risposta s\'at a ignorare si custu tempus no at a èssere coladu. Custu prevenit tocos dòpios atzidentales
Tempus de incarcada longa pro mustrare sa risposta
Tempus mìnimu de incarcada in antis chi su butone pro mustrare sa risposta registret unu tocu.
Ammustra s\'iscadèntzia imbieniente in subra de sos butones de risposta
Ammustra sos butones de risposta mannos
Ammustra su butone de risposta in duas rigas
Ammustra su nùmeru de cartas, tempus de risposta, sa bandera e su marcadore in s\'istanga de susu
Ammustra su nùmeru de cartas chi mancant
Mostra su tempus carculadu chi mancat
Incumintzu de sa die chi benit

plurals.name: day_offset_summ
plurals.comment: %d is going to be replaced with the number of hours past midnight. It can be replaced if something else suits better the translation

resources.string: Permite a àteras aplicatziones de si connètere a AnkiDroid e lèghere / iscrìere datos chene s\'interventu tuo
Butones de sa barra de s\'aplicatzione
Personaliza sas atziones de sa barra de s\'aplicatzione
Pòmpia·ti una lista de aplicatziones chi impreant s\'API de AnkiDroid che a ditzionàrios o àteras ainas.
Ammustra su tìtulu de su matzu

Comente impostatzione predefinida Anki incollat sas immàgines in punta de billete in formadu JPG pro savare logu in sa memòria. Pro incollare sas immàgines in formadu PNG podes, imbetzes, impreare custa optzione.
Incarca 2 bortas in segus pro essire
Pro evitare de essire in manera atzidentale dae su revisionadore o dae s\'aplicatzione
Si Android non reconnoschet un\'archìviu multimediale

string.name: custom_sync_server_summary_none_of_the_two_servers_used
string.comment: This summary is shown when neither of the two custom sync servers are used, which is the default.

resources.string: Comente alternativa a sa sincronizatzione cun AnkiWeb, podes impreare su serbidore tuo pro sa sincronizatzione. Si no est impostadu, in càmbiu s\'at a impreare su serbidore predefinidu de AnkiWeb. Impara de prus

string.name: deck_conf_general
string.comment: Label of the submenu for the general options of new deck

string.name: deck_conf_cram_search
string.comment: Label of a text field that contains a search query.

string.name: deck_conf_cram_reschedule
string.comment: Title of the box labelled by deck_conf_cram_reschedule_summ

resources.string: Torra a pranificare sas cartas in base a sas rispostas meas in custu matzu
Sos ritardos sunt in segundos. 0 torrat sa carta a su matzu originale.
Podes contribuire a AnkiDroid agiudende s\'iscuadra de isvilupu a bìdere ite funtzionalidades impreat sa gente
Remplasa sas lìnias noas cun s\'HTML

In s\'editore de notas cunverte cada istàntzia de
in lìnias noas cando ses modifichende una carta.
Pone in evidèntzia in automàticu su campu ‘iscrie sa risposta’ in su revisore
Aberi su registru de sas modìficas
Custos sunt sos contribuidores istravanados nostros. Fintzas tue podes agiudare AnkiDroid programmende, bortende, donende e àteru galu!
AnkiDroid est publicadu suta de sas litzèntzias GPL-3.0 e AGPL-3.0, cun su còdighe de orìgine a disponimentu in GitHub
Podes suportare s\'isvilupu de AnkiDroid cun una donatzione. Cale si siat tantu est apretziadu meda.
Esecuta JavaScript dae s\'ischermada de ripetitzione
Seletziona su ladu de sa carta

string.name: display_binding_card_side_question
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the question

string.name: display_binding_card_side_answer
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the answer

string.name: display_binding_card_side_both
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to both the question and the answer

string.name: binding_remove_binding
string.comment: The parameter is the name of the key/gesture. Keys cannot be translated yet.

resources.string: AnkiDroid at introduidu unu mecanismu de sìntesi vocale (TTS) megioradu chi est cumpatìbile cun àteros clientes de Anki e includet prus boghes e megioros a sa riprodutzione de limbas!\n\nAtualiza in su primu momentu chi podes, ca custa impostatzione at a èssere bogada luego
Pro praghere atualiza a su formadu nou de sìntesi vocale

Assegura·ti de s\'intentu tuo in antis de abilitare sas optziones de isvilupu. Custas optziones sunt perigulosas e diant pòdere segare s\'aplicatzione o corrùmpere sa colletzione tua.\n\nTene in contu chi custas optziones non sunt adatas pro sa parte manna de sos utentes e pro custa resone non sunt traduidas, duncas sunt in inglesu.

AnkiDroid creat còpias de seguresa periòdicas de sa colletzione tua. Cando sas còpias tenent duas dies, AnkiDroid at a incumintzare a nde bogare calicuna pro liberare ispàtziu in su discu.

Tene in contu chi sos documentos multimediales non benint sarvados in custas còpias. Pro abarrare seguru, sincroniza sa colletzione tua in manera periòdica o archìvia·ti·nde esportatziones.

Podes ripristinare dae una còpia de seguresa e esportare sa colletzione tua in su menù de elencu de sos matzos.
Minutos intre sas còpias de seguresa automàticas
Còpias de seguresa diàrias de mantènnere
Còpias de seguresa chidajolas de mantènnere
Còpias de seguresa mensiles de mantènnere

string.name: pref__widget_text__error
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating a generic error. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__widget_text__calculating
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating that the value, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

plurals.name: pref__widget_text__n_files_n_bytes
plurals.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, showing some statistics about a folder on disk if a form of “12 files\n26 MB”. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Iscantzella sos documentos multimediales no impreados
Iscantzella sas immàgines e sos àteros elementos multimediales chi non tenent su prefissu _ e non sunt mentovados dae peruna nota

string.name: dialog__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can select unused media files to delete

resources.string: Iscantzella sos documentos multimediales no impreados

string.name: pref__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Preference title

string.name: dialog__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can choose backups to delete

string.name: pref__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Iscantzella sa colletzione, sos mèdios, e sas còpias de seguresa. Sas impostatziones de s\'aplicatzione non s\'ant a iscantzellare

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. When the collection is deleted, we exit the process, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Ses seguru de bòlere iscantzellare sa colletzione tua, sos mèdios, e sas còpias de seguresa?\n\nTene in contu: custa atzione at a serrare sa ventana.

string.name: pref__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Iscantzella sa colletzione, sos mèdios, sas còpias de seguresa e sas impostatziones

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Ses seguru de bòlere iscantzellare totu sos datos? Custu at a incluire sa colletzione tua, sos mèdios, sas còpias de seguresa e sas impostatziones.\n\nTene in contu: custa atzione at a serrare sa ventana.

string.name: pref__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Iscantzella sas impostatziones e àteros datos de s\'aplicatzione

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Ses seguru de bòlere iscantzellare sos datos de s\'aplicatzione? Custu at a incluire sas impostatziones e àteros datos de s\'aplicatzione.\n\nTene in contu: custa atzione at a serrare sa ventana.

string.name: pref__etc__summary__fetching
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when the value is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__summary__no_collection
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when a preference is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: pref__etc__summary__error
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when there was an error fetching the value. For example, this is shown when the permission to access collection is lacking

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__fetching
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__calculating
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__no_collection
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference that is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: hide_system_bars
string.comment: Title of a setting that allows to hide the system bars

string.name: hide_system_bars_none
string.comment: Setting option to not hide any of the system bars

string.name: hide_system_bars_status_bar
string.comment: Setting option to hide the system status bar (the top one with clock, battery status, etc)

string.name: hide_system_bars_navigation_bar
string.comment: Setting option to hide the system navigation bar (the bottom one that can go back, to home, etc)

string.name: hide_system_bars_all_bars
string.comment: Setting option to hide all the system bars

resources.string: Cua su butone de sas rispostas

string.name: open_settings
string.comment: Description of the shortcut that opens the app settings
